customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera, price and results
customer_reviews.text: I recently took this camera to Venice for its first trip. This camera is amazing, because of its size and weight its simply effortless to carry around all day and night. The manual controls are a bonus too, they are perfectly placed for a great feel in the hand, especially the aperture ring which I love. The video quality is also extremely impressive for a camera of this class, if you are looking for a holiday camera and don't want to lug around a big SLR ( I switched to this from my Canon 700D + L Glass set up) you will not be disappointed. Remember to shoot in RAW and edit in lightroom for the best results.

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Must admit, I was a little nervous buying a relatively low resolution compact camera, (self confessed pixel peeper) but initial impressions are very favourable, The lens is sharp with snappy focus The images are bright, colour rich and well balanced Depth of field is easily controlled and gives a larger sensor DSLR feel 16:9 Landscape to 4:3 portrait, flick of a switch, without resolution loss! Love it. 4K video (with very good 'capture the moment' stills) The only downside is that I need to give a little more thought when framing (If I want to print A3+), but there again this package is very small considering the sensor size and bright lens.

customer_reviews.title: Simply wonderful compact camera that proves compact no longer means poor image quality and performance...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera. It replaced my Sony RX100 which I lost. I received it the day before travelling to Disneyland Paris, but managed to get wonderful photos including of the firework display at night. The automatic mode is excellent. Only negatives are: a little larger than I'd have ideally liked (the RX100 was better here); the flash isn't built in (but is excellent considering its size); and the lack of an electric lens cap. The image quality, performance, ease of use, and video quality all more than make up for this. Very glad I opted for this rather than the more expensive latest gen RX100... Highly recommended.

product_meta.title: Panasonic LUMIX DMC-LX100EBK Premium Compact Camera with 24 mm LEICA DC Vario-Summilux Lens - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black

LUMIX DMC-LX100 - DESIGNED TO INSPIRE CREATIVITY
The LX100 combines a Micro 4/3" sensor with a fast 24mm Leica DC Vario-Summilux lens and manual operation. It offers a level of creative control usually only found on more complex camera systems.

PICTURE QUALITY
IMPROVED DYNAMIC RANGE, IMPROVED IMAGE CLARITY
At the heart of the Lumix LX100 is a 12.8-megapixel Micro 4/3"MOS sensor - the same type found in more complex camera systems. With a surface area that's greater than many conventional compact cameras, the LX100 has improved low light performance, saturation and defocussed bokeh capture. The larger sensor and dedicated ratio switch let you quickly select different aspect ratios - including 16:9 for wide-angle composition.

View larger FAST, WIDE LEICA LENS
With one of the widest lens in a large sensor camera, the LX100's 24-75mm Leica DC Vario-Summilux offers improved creative flexibility. The F1.7-2.8 range allows for improved low light capture and blur reduction. The unique optical design offers the same performance as a system camera lens, but with half the focal length. Nine diaphragm blades ensure smoother background defocus gradation.

USER COMFORT
MANUAL CONTROLS INSPIRED BY CLASSIC CAMERA DESIGN
With an analogue control environment routed in established camera design, the LX100 has a dedicated aperture ring, focus ring, shutter speed and exposure compensation dial. There's a comfortable, instinctive and tactile familiarity to the feel of these controls. With the LX100, you're given greater freedom to make quick, flexible, creative decisions with even greater accuracy.

Pinpoint Autofocus HIGH DEFINITION LVF FOR PRECISE DETAILS
The LX100 features a 2.764K high-resolution viewfinder. This allows you a greater degree of control when framing shots and integrates manual focus aids and autofocus feedback in an instinctive and responsive fashion. The viewfinder offers a 35mm equivalent magnification.

INSTINCTIVE FOCUS CONTROLS
For shooting in different environments, the LX100 is equipped with a number of tools to help you capture high quality, rich imagery. Using micro contrast detection, focus peaking provides a real-time and intuitive graphic display of focal areas. MF Assist offers up to 10 times magnification for assured crispness, while Pinpoint AF lets you easily designate specific focal points in low light conditions.

CREATIVE PHOTOGRAPHY
ENJOY RICH DETAIL WITH 4K VIDEO
The LX100 shoots video at 4K. With this resolution, greater clarity, depth of detail and colour is captured at source, and allows for improved flexibility when editing. Techniques such as stabilisation and pans can be applied to footage without loss of quality when exporting to full HD. Videos shot at 30fps in 4K allows each individual frame to be extracted as an 8MP image, so you'll never miss a moment.

RAW: AS RICH AS A NEGATIVE
The LX100 can capture images in RAW format, preserving them with the minimum of processing. Colour and light information, as well as metadata, is taken directly from the Micro 4/3"MOS sensor, to allow for greater flexibility when reproducing and editing your images.

IN DEPTH
APERTURE RING
Experimenting with depth of field can add character an expression to your imagery. The LX100 offers a number of different settings - including analogue program mode (both shutter and aperture set to A), aperture and shutter priority, as well as full manual control.

MANUAL FOCUS RING
Use focus to add emphasis to images. The manual focus ring is placed to allow you to easily make creative decisions. Manual assist lets you quickly gauge focal crispness by enlarging a section of your composition by up to 10x.

SHUTTER SPEED DIAL
Add a dynamic quality to your images by experimenting with the shutter speed. The LX100 offers automatic mode (both shutter and aperture set to A), shutter priority as well as full manual control.

EXPOSURE COMPENSATION DIAL
By using exposure control, you can make fine adjustments to accommodate unusual lighting conditions, lens filters and even to over or underexpose images intentionally for effect.

LIVE VIEW FINDER
The LX100 has a high definition Live View Finder with a resolution of 2.764k. This allows for precise composition in strong sunlight with 100% field of view. The refresh rate is 60fps, making it ideal for action photography.

SPECIFICATIONS

Weight: Approx. 351 g without Battery and SD Memory Card/Approx. 393 g with Battery and SD Memory Card

Focusing area: Normal: 50 cm - infinity/AF Macro / MF / Intelligent Auto / Motion Picture: Wide 3 cm - infinity / Tele 30 cm - infinity

Viewfinder: 0.38" LVF (Live View Finder) (2764k dots equivalent), Field of View: Approx. 100%/Magnification: Approx. 1.39x / 0.7x (35mm equiv.), Eye Sensor
